thread.title: OnePlus 3T colette edition with all-black finish unveiled
thread.title_full: OnePlus 3T colette edition with all-black finish unveiled

title: OnePlus 3T colette edition with all-black finish unveiled
text:
OnePlus 3T colette edition with all-black finish unveiled OnePlus 3T colette edition with all-black finish unveiled By March 16, 2017 “Only 250 units of the OnePlus 3T colette Edition will be on sale” 
OnePlus has partnered with colette, a French clothing and accessories house, to introduce a special edition of the OnePlus 3T ( review ) smartphone. Although the brand’s teasers suggested a blue phone, the limited edition OnePlus 3T is available in an all-black hue. Only 250 units of this limited edition OnePlus 3T will be available for sale at the one-day pop-up shop in Paris. 
The new limited edition OnePlus 3T comes with 128GB of storage, and is being bundled with a free pair of OnePlus Bullets V2 earphones for early buyers. The new variant has been priced the same as the regular 128GB model at €479 (~Rs 33,600). The phone will be on sale at the colette store in Paris on March 21st, when doors open at 11 am CET (3.30 pm IST). 
Apart from the new all-black body, the OnePlus 3T special edition also features the colette logo on the back, which mark’s the fashion brand’s 20th anniversary. While the OnePlus 3T colette edition will be out of reach of most users, there’s always the possibility of OnePlus tying up with different partners for more exclusive launches across the world.
